body: non @CBD this is the sequel, if you read the author's note at the end at the translated one, that was a their coming back doujinshi of sorts. and to my kowalski analysis, i guess the guy got fed up at her for rejecting his confession, many times, and just forced himself to her; did it raw at the end to seal some deal. but in the end i guess its a happy end. i might be wrong doe. and to note, if some ya'll be wondering if i hit the post-clarity, non, i didn't.
Translation is needed, now that the sequel got its translation first. The story seems to be quite good, and the art is superb
So this is the prequel interesting

The woman was suicidal due to the scar that damaged her face and wanted to die and the little boy wanted to be with her and is now grown up and asked her to marry him. (That's all I can assume without the translation)
See the dude raped her. I think , I dunno man I can't read japanese
looks like it does end happy. why does she reject him man ;(
Surprisingly dark and sorrowful but with a heartwarming prospect for wholesomeness. Hoping for a happy end for both of them.
